titles.title: A bill to expand the definition of immediate relative for purposes of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
A bill to expand the definition of immediate relative for purposes of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to expand the definition of "immediate relative" to include the unmarried child (under age 21) of a parent of a U.S. citizen, where the child is accompanying or following to join the parent.
